column4: Hi... how can I play .ogm with Totem-streamer on 9.04 (currently using totem-xine, but not ideal)? Currently with gstreamer only the sound plays...
Also, how can I change the GDM theme from the command line (and is it possible to get the old Ubuntu login screen back)?
for the loging screen go to System-> Administration -> Login Windows-> local tab
- Need to change it via the command line (shell script)
